dialog.played_trains: FRSelect the number of trains played.
dialog.you_sure_clear: FRAre you sure you want to clear the scores?
dialog.how_many_add: FRHow many points would you like to add?
dialog.midgame_change: FRIf you make this change mid-game, you will lose existing scores. Are you sure you want to continue?
dialog.how_many_sub: FRHow many points would you like to subtract?
dialog.you_sure_sub: FRAre you sure you want to subtract points? This will disable train counting.
dialog.points_adjust: FRSelect the points adjustment to be applied. Keep in mind, point adjustments do not affect remaining train counts.
dialog.neg_trains: FRYou cannot have negative trains. Please select another option.
